definitions.definition: A remedy believed to cure all disease and prolong life that was originally sought by alchemists ; a cure-all .

examples: A monorail will be a panacea for our traffic woes.

definitions.definition: The plant allheal ( Valeriana officinalis ), believed to cure all ills.

main_definition: A remedy believed to cure all disease and prolong life that was originally sought by alchemists ; a cure-all .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) The plant allheal ( Valeriana officinalis ), believed to cure all ills.
